title: Hampton National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger       Junior Ranger booklets, geared toward rangers five to thirteen years old, are available in the visitor center. The questions in the booklet require a visit to the park. You can download your copy of our Junior Ranger booklets below- however booklets must be submitted in person to receive your badge and certificate.  Â    For Junior Rangers 5-7 years old For Junior Rangers 8-10 years old For Junior Rangers 11-13 years old
